entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are affecting the road this morning and another 1 cm may accumulate on the road. Showers clear later this morning, but another round of snow is expected this evening, with another 10 to 20 cm accumulating about higher parts of the road with less down to 700 metres.

entry.summary: Another round of snow is expected Saturday night into Sunday morning, and 1 to 3 cm may settle about the summit, with lesser amounts down to 800 metres.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are affecting the road this morning and a further 1 cm may accumulate about the summit. Snow showers clear this morning, but return Saturday night with another 1 to 2 cm expected to accumulate about the highest parts of the road.

entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain with thunderstorms possible, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.
